verbose_text: Immunohistochemical staining of VEGFA in the penumbral areas at 24 h post-reperfusion proved that VEGFA expression was markedly reduced; however, there were no differences in the optical intensities of the VEGFA positive immunohistochemical stains in the peri-infarct regions of the ischemic hemispheres 1 week post-reperfusion among the 3 ischemic groups.
